0.scores: I visit this place (or one of the other din tai fung outlets) at least once a month.
0.text: I visit this place (or one of the other din tai fung outlets) at least once a month.

1.scores: Must try: xiao long bao, chili crab bun, fried rice with pork, braised beef noodles.
1.text: Must try: xiao long bao, chili crab bun, fried rice with pork, braised beef noodles.

2.scores: Highly recommend trying the chili sauce also.
2.text: Highly recommend trying the chili sauce also.

2.scores: This place can get crowded, so i recommend that you get a queue number early.
2.text: This place can get crowded, so i recommend that you get a queue number early.

3.scores: For those who are not familiar with asian food, I recommend that your group orders a number of dishes and shares everything (asian way) rather than each person ordering your own dishes.
3.text: For those who are not familiar with asian food, I recommend that your group orders a number of dishes and shares everything (asian way) rather than each person ordering your own dishes.

3.scores: You will get to try alot more food this way!
3.text: You will get to try alot more food this way!

4.scores: This Din Tai Fung is located on the 4th floor next to Japan Food Town.
4.text: This Din Tai Fung is located on the 4th floor next to Japan Food Town.

4.scores: Was there on a Saturday for late lunch.
4.text: Was there on a Saturday for late lunch.

5.scores: The staff at the entrance gave me a number and a paper & pen so I could check what I liked to order while waiting.
5.text: The staff at the entrance gave me a number and a paper & pen so I could check what I liked to order while waiting.

5.scores: The wait was not bad at all.
5.text: The wait was not bad at all.

5.scores: Good thing I did not have to stand in line.
5.text: Good thing I did not have to stand in line.

5.scores: Think I ever mentioned in my other post, I do not like to stand in line, period!
5.text: Think I ever mentioned in my other post, I do not like to stand in line, period!

6.scores: Staffs were all friendly and attentive.
6.text: Staffs were all friendly and attentive.

6.scores: I like that the restaurant has those bag holders/stands, like those in Taste Paradise, which allow female customers to store their purses or bags.
6.text: I like that the restaurant has those bag holders/stands, like those in Taste Paradise, which allow female customers to store their purses or bags.

6.scores: Of cos those at Taste Paradise were a lot better since they came with a flap attached to secure the top.
6.text: Of cos those at Taste Paradise were a lot better since they came with a flap attached to secure the top.

6.scores: The ones at Din Tai Feng were open bag holders which the staff would just put a cloth over it.
6.text: The ones at Din Tai Feng were open bag holders which the staff would just put a cloth over it.

6.scores: Ok I know, I can be so nitpicking.
6.text: Ok I know, I can be so nitpicking.

7.scores: The legendary xiao long bao (steamed dumplings) were yummy as expected.
7.text: The legendary xiao long bao (steamed dumplings) were yummy as expected.

7.scores: I also ordered one red bean bun and one meat bun just to try.
7.text: I also ordered one red bean bun and one meat bun just to try.

7.scores: They were tiny but were good.
7.text: They were tiny but were good.

8.scores: but I did not expect it to be calm and quiet.
8.text: but I did not expect it to be calm and quiet.

8.scores: It was not a place I would suggest for a first date.
8.text: It was not a place I would suggest for a first date.

8.scores: More like a place for friends to catch up or family lunch.
8.text: More like a place for friends to catch up or family lunch.

9.scores: 5/5 Staffs were attentive, helpful and polite.
9.text: 5/5 Staffs were attentive, helpful and polite.

10.scores: Andrew and I always wondered how Din Tai Fung (DTF) can consistently keep their rich flavour after opening many branches around the world.
10.text: Andrew and I always wondered how Din Tai Fung (DTF) can consistently keep their rich flavour after opening many branches around the world.

10.scores: We visited a few Din Tai Fung restaurants when we were in Singapore and were blown away at their good quality control.
10.text: We visited a few Din Tai Fung restaurants when we were in Singapore and were blown away at their good quality control.

10.scores: At the same time we also thought that we were just lucky...
10.text: At the same time we also thought that we were just lucky...

11.scores: Two things that we always ordered in Din Tai Fung were their shrimp & pork shao mai and of course the 18 folds original Xiao Long Bao.
11.text: Two things that we always ordered in Din Tai Fung were their shrimp & pork shao mai and of course the 18 folds original Xiao Long Bao.

11.scores: DTF's xiao long bao is really in the league of their own.
11.text: DTF's xiao long bao is really in the league of their own.

11.scores: Honestly we never found any broken dumpling skin although I never really counted the number of folds on their dumpling.
11.text: Honestly we never found any broken dumpling skin although I never really counted the number of folds on their dumpling.

12.scores: The shao mai was also always very delicious with plenty of pork meats inside.
12.text: The shao mai was also always very delicious with plenty of pork meats inside.

12.scores: I always add vinegar to shao mai and the xiao long bao as I love the additional sour flavour on the meat.
12.text: I always add vinegar to shao mai and the xiao long bao as I love the additional sour flavour on the meat.

12.scores: Of course the price of their dishes are more than the other Chinese restaurants but the quality never disappoints us.
12.text: Of course the price of their dishes are more than the other Chinese restaurants but the quality never disappoints us.

13.scores: Not too many options for pork allergies.
13.text: Not too many options for pork allergies.

13.scores: Almost every dumpling has pork alongside the other protein.
13.text: Almost every dumpling has pork alongside the other protein.

14.scores: Go out of my way to visit in other locations when I travel like San Francisco and Seattle.
14.text: Go out of my way to visit in other locations when I travel like San Francisco and Seattle.

14.scores: Reasonable price, fast service and great tasting food.
14.text: Reasonable price, fast service and great tasting food.

14.scores: They are not known for their customer service, but the food makes up for it.
14.text: They are not known for their customer service, but the food makes up for it.

14.scores: I will never have pork dumplings better than at DTF.
14.text: I will never have pork dumplings better than at DTF.

15.scores: Very good food and efficient service.
15.text: Very good food and efficient service.

15.scores: I came here for the dimsum and was beyond satisfied!
15.text: I came here for the dimsum and was beyond satisfied!

16.scores: The taro buns from this place still haunt my dreams.
16.text: The taro buns from this place still haunt my dreams.

16.scores: I had no idea how delightful taro could possibly be, but this is over the top.
16.text: I had no idea how delightful taro could possibly be, but this is over the top.

16.scores: It's a staple item for me to look for now on every menu of DTF and the second item I order after the soup dumplings.
16.text: It's a staple item for me to look for now on every menu of DTF and the second item I order after the soup dumplings.

16.scores: Din Tai Fung does it to me every time with their perfectly steamed items.
16.text: Din Tai Fung does it to me every time with their perfectly steamed items.

16.scores: One you understand how to eat the steamed soup dumplings you will look for this place in every city you visit.
16.text: One you understand how to eat the steamed soup dumplings you will look for this place in every city you visit.

16.scores: The soup dumplings are absolutely incredible, but there are a few surprise dishes that are nearly as impressive.
16.text: The soup dumplings are absolutely incredible, but there are a few surprise dishes that are nearly as impressive.

16.scores: The fried rice is absolutely delightful and there is a rice dish for dessert that looks like it has some melted jelly beans in it, but I promise you is incredible.
16.text: The fried rice is absolutely delightful and there is a rice dish for dessert that looks like it has some melted jelly beans in it, but I promise you is incredible.

16.scores: The service is always prompt and efficient and the value for the quality you receive is impeccable.
16.text: The service is always prompt and efficient and the value for the quality you receive is impeccable.

17.scores: Couldn't decide what to eat, and stumbled on DTF.
17.text: Couldn't decide what to eat, and stumbled on DTF.

17.scores: I've had such high expectations for their soup dumplings that when they came out, I was a little disappointed.
17.text: I've had such high expectations for their soup dumplings that when they came out, I was a little disappointed.

17.scores: Not to say they weren't good or anything, because they were but just overly hyped.
17.text: Not to say they weren't good or anything, because they were but just overly hyped.

18.scores: The dumplings are small and succulent.
18.text: The dumplings are small and succulent.

18.scores: The drunken chicken was moist and full of alcohol.
18.text: The drunken chicken was moist and full of alcohol.

18.scores: I don't think it's a 5 star restaurant
18.text: I don't think it's a 5 star restaurant

19.scores: The food tastes really good, but the price is too expensive.
19.text: The food tastes really good, but the price is too expensive.

20.scores: I heard you have to practice for 1 year before they let you prepare food for customers.
20.text: I heard you have to practice for 1 year before they let you prepare food for customers.
